articles.title: Scottish ceremony sees King Charles tread a thin line - BBC
articles.description: The British state is attempting to showcase and honour Scotland without encouraging nationalism.
articles.content:
The autumn sunlight streamed in through the east window of St Giles' and lit up a scene for the ages.
In a coffin of oak, beneath the red and yellow royal standard of Scotland, lay Queen Elizabeth.… [+9618 chars]

articles.title: Indiana Jones 5 Box Office Crash Reveals New Danger for Raiders of Nostalgia - Den of Geek
articles.description: Disney turned Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny into one of the most expensive movies ever made. So why do audiences seem fairly ambivalent?
articles.content: As aforementioned, Crystal Skull did capture the audience more prone to spend disposable income on going to the movies in 2008. But even just the 13 to 25 year olds are now 28 to 40 years old, and th… [+3240 chars]
